summary: This mod change appearance, skills and equipment of Rayya follower from Hearthfire DLC.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========

This mod change appearance, skills and equipment of Rayya follower from Hearthfire DLC. Rayya is a Redguard warrior found in the Jarl\'s Longhouse in Falkreath. She becomes your personal housecarl when you have earned the title of Thane in Falkreath Hold.

Details
=======

v1.0
Changes made by this mod:
- changed appearance of Rayya NPC,
- changed skills (she use double melee weapons, light armor),
- changed equipment (she have Thieves guild armor).

Requirement
===========

Needed for this mod to work.

- Heartfire DLC

Incompatibility
===============

Any mod that changes Rayya NPC.

History
=======

1.0, 2/4/2013 - Initial release.
author: thenexusforumslol
